programme.title: Fighter planes for Egypt
programme.short_synopsis: President Carter agrees to sell fighter planes to Egypt.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Carter backs sale of US-built fighter jets to Egypt. Worst winter weather in north-east for decades.
programme.long_synopsis:
President Carter backs sale of US-built fighter jets to Egypt. Worst winter weather in north-east for decades.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
